blocks.text: Spark powers new development real estate
Spark (https://www.spark.re) is a sales, marketing, and customer relationship management platform designed specifically for the new development/pre-sale real estate industry.

runs.text: is a sales, marketing, and customer relationship management platform designed specifically for the new development/pre-sale real estate industry.

blocks.text: Follow along with this documentation to learn about how to use the API and contact us at support@spark.re (https://mailto:support@spark.re) if you have any further questions.
